post.author: 변성민
post.content:
5월 29 일자로 (2006) 저희 회사 internal posting 된 position 입니다.


JOB TITLE:        Support Analyst  
DEPARTMENT:        Technology Services
                Worldsource Financial Management Inc. (“WFM”)
                Worldsource Securities Inc. (“WSI”)
REPORTING TO:        Manager, Technology Services

JOB STATEMENT:  
Reporting to the Manager, Technology Services, the Support Analyst is responsible for system support including installation, maintenance, training, research, planning, diagnostics, procedures, documentation and help desk on networks, servers, peripheral devices, PC software and server-based software.  The successful candidate must have the ability to manage the needs of both the WFM team (90%) and the WFM and WSI advisors and administrators across Canada.

ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:
•        Install & maintain networks, servers, peripheral devices, PC software & server-based software;
•        Provide first line support on WFM Help Desk;
•        Provide internal support & training;
•        Maintain the Microsoft Exchange test & production servers at optimal operating levels;
•        Provide ongoing evaluations & recommendations to optimize usage of Network & facilities;
•        Assist in establishing, implementing procedures & documentation/reporting on back-up
procedures, network topology, inventory and security standards;
•        Install and maintain software new releases & upgrades;
•        Design & plan for the implementation of a test network;
•        Provide diagnostics & recommendations in support of malfunctioning equipment; and
•        Other projects & project support on technical solutions.

JO SPECIFICATIONS:
•        University/College degree
•        5 years minimum experience in Network & Client Server Technologies
•        Technical knowledge & experience with Microsoft Exchange Server maintenance, NT or
Windows Platform
•        Technical knowledge of Network Protocols (IPX/SPX, TCP/IP)
•        Technical knowledge & configuration of PC Workstations/Servers/Notebooks/Printers
•        Excellent analytical, interpersonal, communication & customer service skills
•        Familiarity with Cisco routers and Backup software would be an asset
•        Experience in an investment industry environment would be an asset

SALARY:
•        Commensurate with experience

If you are interested in applying for this position, please forward a cover letter & resume in confidence to hr@guardiancapital.com.
post.title: Job opportunity at WorldSource Financial
